name: Nightmare Labyrinth (itch)
description:
Nightmare Labyrinth is a VR game 3d where players have to pass throught the labyrinth until out of the labyrinth.

How to play this game

- Press button on VR CARDBOARD to walk and if want to stop repeat press on VR CARDBOARD.

- Find a way out of the labyrinth to complete this game.

- Nightmare Labyrinth can see 360  degrees.

Music by

1. Music name : Cracking the code

      Composer   : Bjorn Lynne

2. Music name : Fantasy Exploration

       Composer  : Bjorn Lynne
